name: Blastomancer: The Puzzle Game
storyline: The wicked Distortions were once thought to have been defeated for good, but their sudden invasion proves that clearly someone had it wrong. Guided by your mentor, Grandmaster Blaster Doolius Fillias, it falls to you, a student of the blasting art of Blastomancy to test your skills, use your bombs, vanquish the invading Distortions, free your world and save the day - hopefully for good this time!
summary: Blastomancer: The Puzzle Game is a logical puzzle game with a fun, playful story and a unique art style to match.
